title: International Journal of Homeopathy, Complementary and Alternative Medicine
description: International Journal of Homeopathy, Complementary and Alternative Medicine is a journal for complementary medicines such as Acupuncture, Ayurveda, Homeopathy, Naturopathy, Chinese or Oriental medicine and Unani herbal medicines.
cleaned_text: International journal of homeopathy, complementary and Alternative medicine (IJHCAM) is a biannual journal that focuses on quality publications under a peer review process. It provides updated scientific knowledge to complementary practitioners. It is a scientific journal that publishes articles in February and July. International journal of homeopathy, complementary and Alternative medicine (IJHCAM) is a biannual journal that focuses on quality publications under a peer review process. It provides updated scientific knowledge to complementary practitioners. It is a scientific journal that publishes articles biannually. International journal of homeopathy, complementary and Alternative medicine (IJHCAM) pays special attention to complementary medicines, such as Acupuncture, Ayurveda, Homeopathy, Naturopathy, Chinese or Oriental medicine and Unani
